ModMetaData.name: Research Tree SK
ModMetaData.author: qwerty19106
ModMetaData.description:
Based on Fluffy's Research Tree, but 95% rewritten.
<size=20>Gameplay features</size>
- Researches placement adapted for HSK - Automatic placement of researches from additional mods separately from the main tree - Expanded functionality for managing the research queue (adding to the beginning of the queue, dragging research within queue) - Search improvements - Added the ability to open the information window about an item directly from the tree - Added standard icon for recipes without it - Redesigned appearance - Performance improvements - Various fixes and improvements
<size=20>Development features</size>
- Replaced auto build with manual placement (available in development mode) - ResearchProjectDef must have ModExtension Class="ResearchTreeSK.ResearchTreeSKModExtension" to be available for manual placement - ModExtension for SK researches is added using xml patch, with search by tab name - Changed research coordinates can be copied from the game to the clipboard. Also, it is possible to generate xml patch with the coordinates of all researches.
<size=20>Credits</size>
qwerty19106 - C# programming Spaniard - idea, graphics, testing
Thanks to Fluffy for the original ResearchTree mod. Thanks to BaalEvan for the basis for modifying the queue function. Thanks to everyone who helped with advice and recommendations.
The mod was created specifically for Hardcore SK.
